body_html:
I'm a python noob and was going crazy trying to use this "module".

AttributeError: module 'torch.optim' has no attribute 'lr_scheduler'

Finally got it working by using:

from torch.optim import lr_scheduler
body_text:
I'm a python noob and was going crazy trying to use this "module".
AttributeError: module 'torch.optim' has no attribute 'lr_scheduler'

Finally got it working by using:
from torch.optim import lr_scheduler
body:
I'm a python noob and was going crazy trying to use this "module".

```
AttributeError: module 'torch.optim' has no attribute 'lr_scheduler'
```

Finally got it working by using:

```
from torch.optim import lr_scheduler
```
